description: Spotted laurel (Aucuba japonica 'Mr. Goldstrike') is an amazing plant species because of its striking appearance. Its glossy, evergreen leaves consist of yellow spots on a dark green background, making for a beautiful landscape feature all year round. It is also extremely hardy and can thrive in shady spots that other plants struggle to survive in. As if that wasnâ€™t enough, this species is able to tolerate a wide range of soil types and is generally low-maintenance once established. All these qualities combined make spotted laurel an ideal choice for the garden.
